title: CEO at Google
about: I've had the fortune of being on several high performing teams in various high stakes arenas -investment banking, private equity, venture-backed startup, social enterprise, rugby (yes, rugby) - on three continents and on both coasts of the US.

experience.title: Venture Partner
experience.about: Investing for the SaaStr Fund and helping our portfolio and others grow. See you at the SaaStr Annual!

experience.title: Board Member, Cofounder, Advisor
experience.about: After 5 years leading a team of courageous teammates who are innovating the best way to find and attract the right talent, I’ve transitioned to a board and advisor role. Notable accomplishments during my tenure as CEO include raising 3 rounds of venture capital from tier 1 VC funds (5x’ing our valuation in the process), building a global B2B product used by 100s of companies and over 20,000 people in 40+ countries, acquiring our most intelligent competitor and integrating their machine...
